title: Accessing CenturyLink (Embarqmail) from a Web Browser or Email Client

steps.title: Visit http://www.centurylink.net.
steps.content: Visit http://www.centurylink.net . Embarqmail accounts can be accessed from CenturyLink's website.

steps.title: Click on Email in the upper-right corner of the screen.
steps.content: Click on Email in the upper-right corner of the screen. Alternatively, you can also click on either of the two Log In links as well if you do not see the Email link.

steps.title: When the page loads, type your email into the username box.
steps.content: When the page loads, type your email into the username box. Include the full email address, including the "@embarqmail.com" suffix.

steps.title: Type your password into the password box.
steps.content: Type your password into the password box. Passwords are case sensitive, so make sure you're writing the correct upper- and lower-case letters.

steps.title: Click Sign In.
steps.content: Click Sign In . You will be directed to your Embarqmail inbox after doing so. If you are returned to the homepage, hit the email button again and it should take you right into your email. Otherwise, it should automatically bring you in after hitting Sign In .
